divs: Sighting DetailsIt's had happened several times last month, that star shows up a differents height from the horizont. Higher or lower, looks like it has a secundary and smaller red light hovering around. The "star" moves up or down, disapearing and shining back again and again. Nights were clear, so no clouds made it disapear. Has anyone have any idea?
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Pembroke Pines
There were no other sightings in Pembroke Pines on or around May 28th 2010
Summary: Looks like a star but bigger, brighter and closer than tthe others, we could see a smaller red light flying around.
